quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
author: Albus Dumbledore

quote: Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
author: Dumbledore

quote: You are a wizard, Harry.
author: Rubeus Hagrid

quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
author: Dumbledore

quote: After all this time? Always.
author: Severus Snape

quote: Words are, in my not-so-humble opinion, our most inexhaustible source of magic.
author: Dumbledore

quote: We've all got both light and dark inside us. What matters is the part we choose to act on. That's who we really are.
author: Sirius Black

quote: You know, Minister, I disagree with Dumbledore on many counts...but you cannot deny he's got style...
author: Phineas Nigellus Black

quote: Have you any idea how much tyrants fear the people they oppress? All of them realize that, one day, amongst their many victims, there is sure to be one that rises against them and strikes back!
author: Dumbledore

quote: Wit beyond measure is man's greatest treasure.
author: Luna Lovegood

quote: To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure.
author: Dumbledore

quote: I solemnly swear that I am up to no good.
author: Fred and George Weasley

quote: It is the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more.
author: Dumbledore

quote: Fear of a name increases fear of the thing itself.
author: Hermione Granger

quote: Numbing the pain for a while will make it worse when you finally feel it.
author: Sirius Black

quote: The world is not in your books and maps; it's out there.
author: Gilderoy Lockhart

quote: I am what I am, an' I'm not ashamed. 'Never be ashamed,' my ol' dad used ter say, 'there's some who'll hold it against you, but they're not worth botherin' with.'
author: Rubeus Hagrid

quote: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.
author: Dumbledore

quote: Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love.
author: Luna Lovegood

quote: In dreams, we enter a world that's entirely our own.
author: Dumbledore

quote: Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
author: Dumbledore

quote: Dobby is free.
author: Dobby

quote: To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure.
author: Dumbledore

quote: If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.
author: Sirius Black

quote: We must all face the choice between what is right and what is easy.
author: Dumbledore

author: Albus Dumbledore
